homepage.title: Homepage
homepage.description: Ariana Soares, a specialist in Personal Color Analysis and Makeup, helps enhance natural beauty through color analysis and personalized techniques. Discover your ideal palette and elevate your image with personalized beauty consulting.
homepage.about_highlighted: Hello — I am Ariana Soares, an Entrepreneur & Image Consultant, based in Massachusetts.
homepage.about_text: With international experience, I work with clients from all over the world, both online and in-person.

work.title: Work
work.description: Ariana Soares – Image and Beauty Consultant dedicated to empowering women.

paragraphs.title: MaryKay Consultant
paragraphs.paragraph: My mission is to provide transformative experiences for every client, through a complete line of skincare and makeup products. With Mary Kay, I teach each woman how to highlight her beauty and boost self-esteem.

paragraphs.title: Image and Professional Makeup Consultant
paragraphs.paragraph: As an image consultant, I help clients discover their personal style, creating a wardrobe that reflects their essence. Through color and style analysis, I offer practical guidance so every client feels confident and comfortable with their appearance.

paragraphs.title: Beauty Workshops and Events
paragraphs.paragraph: I organize workshops on beauty and style, where I share techniques and practical knowledge. These events offer an opportunity for participants to learn, explore new ideas, and feel more confident on their beauty journey.

marykay.title: Mary Kay
marykay.description: Discover Mary Kay beauty solutions and personalized consultations.

paragraphs.title: Welcome to Mary Kay
paragraphs.paragraph: Welcome to the world of Mary Kay, where each product is designed to enhance your beauty and promote self-care. As your beauty consultant, I'm here to guide you in finding products that complement your skin, style, and personality, helping you build a personalized beauty routine.

paragraphs.title: Personalized Skincare
paragraphs.paragraph: Find facial care products that meet your skin's specific needs, from hydration to anti-aging solutions, giving you a healthy and radiant complexion.

paragraphs.title: Makeup to Enhance
paragraphs.paragraph: From classic shades to bold looks, every Mary Kay makeup product is created to highlight the best in you. Learn techniques to apply makeup practically and feel confident in any setting.

paragraphs.title: Personalized Beauty Consultations
paragraphs.paragraph: Through individual consultations, I help you choose the right products for you and teach you how to integrate these products into your daily routine. You can opt for in-person or online consultations, offering total convenience.

paragraphs.title: Join My Team
paragraphs.paragraph: Are you passionate about beauty and want to help others feel great about themselves? Join my Mary Kay team and start a fulfilling career where you empower others while building your own business. Contact me to learn more.

marykay-team.title: My MaryKay Team
marykay-team.description: Explore the benefits and growth opportunities of joining the Mary Kay consultant team.

paragraphs.title: Benefits of Becoming a Mary Kay Consultant
paragraphs.paragraph: By joining my team, you’ll receive comprehensive training, support materials, and the guidance needed to develop your own business. Mary Kay offers a flexible structure, allowing you to work at your own pace and build a source of income based on your goals.

paragraphs.title: Growth Opportunities
paragraphs.paragraph: From rewards to recognition events, Mary Kay values your effort and dedication. With my guidance and the brand's ongoing training, you’ll gain the knowledge and confidence to thrive as a consultant.

paragraphs.title: Interested in Learning More?
paragraphs.paragraph: Contact me to find out how you can become a Mary Kay consultant and join a team of motivated women passionate about transforming lives and building a brighter future.

image-consultancy.title: Image Consultancy
image-consultancy.description: Discover your unique style with personalized image consulting services.

paragraphs.title: Personal Color Analysis
paragraphs.paragraph: Discover the color palette that best complements your skin, hair, and eyes, highlighting your natural beauty and adding harmony to your look.

paragraphs.title: Style Definition
paragraphs.paragraph: We identify your personal style and tailor your wardrobe so that you feel confident in any situation. From professional to casual looks, we’ll define a style that works for your daily life.

paragraphs.title: Capsule Wardrobe
paragraphs.paragraph: Build a practical, efficient wardrobe with versatile pieces that allow you to create elegant combinations and simplify your routine.

transform-wardrobe.title: Transform Your Wardrobe
transform-wardrobe.description: Get a refreshed and organized wardrobe tailored to your style and needs.

paragraphs.title: Organization and Optimization
paragraphs.paragraph: We start by analyzing your current wardrobe, identifying key pieces, and removing anything that no longer reflects your style. Then, we reorganize your wardrobe to make it easier to create daily looks.

paragraphs.title: Selection of Versatile Pieces
paragraphs.paragraph: We’ll choose versatile, quality pieces that suit your style and personality, helping you build a functional, coordinated wardrobe.

paragraphs.title: Personalized Consultancy
paragraphs.paragraph: Everyone is unique, so I adapt this service to your preferences and lifestyle, ensuring that each piece in your wardrobe makes sense for you.
